mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project ( ticket_number, project_name, description, service_kbn_code, status, priority, progress_rate, is_active ) VALUES ( #{ticketNumber}, #{projectName}, #{description}, #{serviceKbnCode}, #{status}, #{priority}, #{progressRate}, true )
mapper.select: SELECT ticket_number, project_name, service_kbn_code, status, priority, progress_rate, description, created_at, updated_at FROM project WHERE ticket_number = #{ticketNumber}

SELECT p.project_id , p.ticket_number , p.project_name , p.description , p.service_kbn_code , c.category_name service_kbn_name , p.status , c1.category_name status_name , p.priority , c2.category_name priority_name , p.progress_rate , p.is_active FROM project p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.service_kbn_code = c.category_code AND c.category_type_code = 'SERVICE_KBN' AND c.is_active = TRUE LEFT JOIN category c1 ON p.status = c1.category_code AND c1.category_type_code = 'STATUS_REDMINE_KBN' AND c1.is_active = TRUE LEFT JOIN category c2 ON p.priority = c2.category_code AND c2.category_type_code = 'PRIORITY_KBN' AND c2.is_active = TRUE WHERE p.is_active = true
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{projectName}, '%')
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET project_name = #{projectName}, description = #{description}, service_kbn_code = #{serviceKbnCode}, status = #{status}, priority = #{priority}, progress_rate = #{progressRate}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ticket_number = #{ticketNumber}
UPDATE project SET is_active = false, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ticket_number = #{ticketNumber}
